entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening then 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
